'''House Bulwer''' is a vassal house from [[The Reach]] sworn to [[House Hightower]]. Their seat is [[Blackcrown]].
sections.Known members: *{[[Jack Bulwer]]}, nicknamed Black Jack Bulwer. A Builder of the [[Night's Watch]]. Killed in a [[wildling]] [[Sack of Mole's Town|attack]] on [[Mole's Town]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, House Bulwer is headed by Lady Alysanne Bulwer, a child of seven.Â TheirÂ sigil is a bull's skull, bone over blood and their words are "Death Before Disgrace".
